p: BSAAs could also serve as treatment of other co-morbidities, therefore, simplifying the therapy and lowering its cost (Table S1). For example, the concomitant actions of ezetimibe and statins could be beneficial for treatment of both hypertension and several viral infections in patients with these co-morbidities (NCT00908011, NCT00099684, NCT00843661, NCT03490097, NCT00994773, NCT00441493).
